| History                 = The People's Protection Agency is [[China]]'s equivalent of America's [[Project Wideawake (Earth-616)|Project Wideawake]]. It's mission is to find, remove, contain, and control the growing mutant population within the People's Republic of China. In addition to having soldiers equipped with high-tech weaponry and the artificially-enhanced [[China Force (Earth-616)|China Force]], they have a satellite relay network with scanners that can track mutagenic signatures. [[Reignfire (Earth-616)|Reignfire]] of the [[Mutant Liberation Front (Earth-616)|Mutant Liberation Front]] betrayed the Chinese mutant dissident group [[3Peace (Earth-616)|3Peace]] to them as an alliance with the People's Protection Agency was beneficial to Reignfire, though the 3Peace members were able to escape the ambush.{{r|X-Force Annual Vol 1 3}}
